I couldn't be happier with this denim dress! It's absolutely stunning and exceeded all my expectations. 评论概述: I'm sure it looks great if it fit.

Unfortunately, even this size, which is larger than my normal size according to the size chart, wasn't even able to be buttoned because it was so tight. I thought I could maybe keep it to use as a layering piece over dresses if I left it unbuttoned but sadly even the arms were too tight for me. I wish there was a size that actually fit me.
Just as pictured, loose fit, comfortable. I really like this casual dress. I would buy again.

This is actual Jean material, very cute and comfortable, I am a 36DD and I should have bought an XL so I returned the large to do that because there is not a lot of stretch to the fabric but other than that it is so cute and perfect for summer

评论概述: This brand runs small on top, large at waist
评论详情: I have several denim dresses from this brand, it took me a few tries to figure out what size was best. I am 5’4” ~155 pounds, bust is 38A with disproportionately wide shoulders, short waist at 37.5” and size large is perfect in three different luvamia dresses, i think it’s safe to assume that their dress sizing is fairly consistent.  I have this particular dress in the light green and medium blue denim color (forgot the color names). The fabric is pretty sturdy, not as heavy as jeans but much more substantial than one would expect from an Amazon purchase. Dress doesn’t wrinkle too badly as long as it’s hung up or at least laid flat, right out of the dryer. If there was any shrinking, I can’t really tell.  This dress fits comfortably, and while i don’t feel that I look super dumpy in it, it’s giving me prison uniform vibes lol. The green one does not feel that way. This would look super cute on someone with a curvier shape, though there isn’t an awful lot of room for a bigger bust. I am square shaped and this dress does not hide that. That doesn’t really bother me these days, but if anyone is looking to avoid the squared up women’s correctional look, try the sleeveless button down with the frayed hem.
I can’t wear this because the smell won’t come out. I’ve washed it so many times, soaked it, etc. and it smells horrible. Too bad I missed the return window.
I wear xl all the time and this was to small in the bust. Cute otherwise.  I wear a 38D.

I was pretty nervous to buy this due to all the reviews of it smelling. I live in the United States so not sure if that matters or not but right out of the package there was no smell of any kind. The dress feels well made. I’m normally a Lg because I do have a bigger bust size, 36DD/38DD. I got a medium and I like the way it fits. It the tiniest snug on the boobs but doesn’t squish them. I like this dress. It’s perfect for me

I saw this dress and knew I wanted it! It was the perfect addition to my wardrobe and works for both work and my personal life! The fabric is thick like you want when you are wearing denim. I will be buying another on in another color soon!
I love the color, the green really pops!

Love the lavender color and I get so many compliments on it. Fits true to size. I’m 118 lbs and 5”3’ and small is great. Material is thick though so it’s not great for 100 degree days if I’m going to be outside. But otherwise love it.

Very versatile and comfortable. Length is perfect for summer to wear with sandals but can pair with leggings in the fall. Thickness is perfect as it wasn’t too confining. Excellent quality with stretch and elasticity.

评论概述: The perfect canvas for my students!
评论详情: I love this dress. The fabric is a thicker cotton denim. It was the perfect canvas for my students to create a masterpiece AND many of my fellow teachers asked for the link because they thought it was too cute!  Fit: short to but too short and the sleeves felt comfortable (I usually have an issue with tight sleeves) I will say that the buttons pulled opena little. Could have gone a size up, but it wasn't a deal-breaker.
This dress is super cute.  I bought a medium and am 5'10 and 170.  It fits well everywhere but the chest.  I am small chested so no worries for me, but I still would not want it any tighter.

Perfect dress for casual wear. I am 5’4” and dress falls right above my knee. It’s casual and comfortable. Does have a slight smell but hopefully will wash out. May have to size up if have larger chest.

Very comfortable! Super cute on! Good quality!

I was influenced on this dress. It’s super cute. Great color and quality. But I returned it. I’m 5’7” and got a small. It was too short, especially if I was to bend over. The buttons had some gapping too at the bottom.
Fabric is super heavy so not sure if I can wear this when it’s hot. The red is a really bright red and I was looking for a more muted red but not pink. No pockets is a disappointment.

This is a very cute dress and fits well BUT the wash is super smelly. It smells like gas or something horribly synthetic. I've tried washing it 3x but I have to return it because the smell isn't fading and it gives me a headache.

It’s way too big for the sizing yet, small in the chest area. I was really hoping to love this product as I want the perfect little jean dress.

I really like this dress it’s very flattering. It looks a little darker than the picture, but that’s OK. I’m about 5’ 7” 160 lbs I carry most of my weight in my chest, stomach and bottom;) The camouflage is great! I washed it in cool water dried it in the dryer. Everything came out good. It has a faint smell of, well, like a dryer sheet. I’ll add a little vinegar next wash. I think I’ll get another one.
Adorable dress; fits true to size; good length; easy to wash in cold.

Bought the foxy gray- I usually wear a XL for dresses but based on the shape of the dress and reviews, I sized down to a large. I’m small busted, but I couldn’t button this up..I would say the large fit more like a medium. I would probably size up to a xxl.

Very cute dress. Washed up nicely. The reason for four stars is that the dress seems to run quite big. I normally wear a medium (about 5’5” and 124 pound), based on reviews, I ordered a small, and while it is wearable, it is definitely too big through the waist and the shoulder seams are quite wide.

评论概述: There are two types of fabric
评论详情: The cut is very cute, and the dress is comfortable. There are two types of fabrics if you notice. One with 85% cotton, 15% polyester, and the other with 100% cotton. I bought one from each. The material with less cotton (Bay Blue) is lighter and more breathable; it seems to be of perfect thickness for spring. The other one with 100% cotton (hot pink) is a bit heavier, however, it may be too warm for summer days.  The color in both is vibrant and the same as the picture. In my opinion, it runs a tad large on the upper part and especially on the shoulders. I am a size 0, and XS is more of a loose fit for me, but not in a bad way. Pockets would have been an excellent addition, and the collar could have been larger. It does seem a little pricy but the quality is decent.
This dress is super comfy, and partcularly good on those days when you don't feel your slimmest but still want to look cute. Fabric feels like thick denim. Color is as picutred.

评论概述: Perfect fit, Great Quality, Light Weight Denim
评论详情: I ordered the Indigo Blue in an XL & love it. I'm 5'1", 146 lbs, bust 40C and the fit is terrific. My problem area is my gut and this hides all buldges and bumps. The length is right at my knee so it isn't too short. I'm a senior and I don't feel that this dress is just for the younger ladies. The material is  a light weight denim& I don't believe it's too heavy for Texas summers. I was pleasently surprised at the quality of this dress. As yet I haven't washed this dress so I don't know about shrinkage.

Cute dress, fit was great - had a terrible smell that I was unable to get out. I tried normal detergent, borax and washing soda, a vinegar soak, borax and washing soda after the vinegar soak… nothing took the smell out. All in all washed it about 9 times… Ended up just throwing it away.

I love this dress. It’s super cute and good quality. The denim doesn’t seem to be too heavy for summer. I am 5’4” and 147 lbs and got a size medium. It fits perfectly but I want to say I am very flat chested. If I lean over or shrug my shoulders it’s tight in the shoulders and arms. I considered exchanging for a large but I’m trying to drop a few pounds so I will keep it and maybe not dry it until I do. So if you’re my size but busty you may need to get a size large. It’s adorable though. I think I may order other colors.
As I stated in the video, I am really disappointed in this dress because it’s huge on me and there’s nowhere on the dress indicating what size this dress is and nowhere on the packaging either.

I have washed the black denim dress twice now and it still smells like vinegar or something. Anyone else have this problem? I want to wear it but I'm afraid that it STINKS and I didn't use any vinegar or anything sour smelling. WHAT IS IT???

The style of this dress is cute.  My only negative comments are like several other reviews, the bottom skirt part is too wide.  I ended up running a narrower seam up both sides.  The bodice is a bit tight so I ended up wearing a tank top under it and opened a couple of buttons. It worked.  I am 5'4"/130lbs---bought a small medium denim.  Color was good.  It was not a great fit but it worked for my girls' trip to Texas.  I think the price is a bit high for the dress.

I bought this because it was the only dress that could arrive overnight. I didn’t have high expectations but I love it! I’ve worn it multiple times. It’s just as good after being washed. Runs true to size.
I have to return due to the fit.  The Chest was too tight and buttons were gapping in between.  I bought size XL and I wear a 38DDD bra size.
Ordered large, too big.  Will reorder - so cute and easy to wear.

So cute. Great fit. This is a medium. I weigh 160. 5'7 tall. 38DD cup. The length is good. Not short. The busy is just right!! Not tight but not loose. The middle section is just like it should be for a baby doll dress. Not to big. Does NOT make me look pregnant. Great denium material. No stretch. Arms fit well, not tight, just comfortable. Buttons are great, hold well. Iron on flowers are such a nice accent for some character! Everything is just like the picture shown.  For me, this is an expensive dress. But, I love it and am keeping it. I paid $$44 when I purchased it, in April 2024. I also bought a long sleeve one from this supplier and love it just the same. It also is a large and has a great fit. Same price. It has wonderful, cozy pockets to that one! I'm very happy with my purchases and highly recommend.

评论概述: Color is not raspberry. But is really cute.
评论详情: This dress is super cute and I will keep it. It is not raspberry, or a shade of raspberry I’ve ever seen. It has an orange base with a red/pink dye. It’s unusual but would still be fun for summer. Length is good for someone that is 5 4”, 165 lbs and middle aged.
So cute!
Loved the fit! I saw from other reviews that it’s tight in the chest so I sized up and it fits great.

I bought a Large. I do usually wear a L denim style shirt never medium. Was surprised that this has plenty of room around my biceps and shoulders, which are strong/large. So, I would not size up! The body of the dress is also loose. My husband said right off that I should size down because of this. It's very cute!  Couple weeks later... I ordered a Medium in black. the body is fitting me fine. sized much better for me. a little short. Again, I always wear size large in tops.  It's a fun dress either way. good quality. casual dress.
Got this as a gift for my wife. Like the title says - wife loved it. Timeless attractive look and seems like it will last.
I love the red color for wearing to spring/early summer polo matches or dressed up for a casual dinner. Nice faded color, great fit and length - I'll be wearing this one a lot!

This dress is high-quality! The denim is thicker than I thought it would be and there aren’t pockets but it is sooooo cute! It runs *slightly* big imo (I got an XXL) so keep that in mind. It’s a great spring/summer dress!
This dress is very light and comfortable for casual wear for spring and summer.
Nothing popping about this dress, good to run errands. The left side has more cloth than the right side. Under the bust could’ve been more tapered.
Fit as expected.  Great spring and summer dress.
I like this Jean dress and color  I think I am going to order the blue  one with daisies at the bottom  too.  This dress is really cute. Well made .
This is a must have in your closet. It did come a lot more pink than I anticipated. However it will fade with a wash. Love the pink! Quality is heavy but I prefer it that way!

I love that the fit is very flattering, but also very loose fitting so you do not feel cramped in the dress. I am 5'4'' and got a medium and they are appropriate for me to wear as a teacher!

评论概述: Has a ashy wash..material is cheap.
评论详情: If you are looking for that bold color in the pictures, this isnt the dress for you. The wash is ashy and the material is on the cheaper side. This would not be ideal for the summer months at all.
The material is quality. love how it looks in the front but i dont love the 'tiered' look in the back.

This is a really cute little dress that I will wear both casually (beer festival!) or even to work on a Friday…so adorable. I read the reviews and while I normally wear a size 4 or 6 (I’m 5’8” and around 135-140), I sized up to a medium due to length. I do wish it was a tad more fitted in the waist and chest, but I washed it and dried it on hot and it shrank enough that it looks pretty good and I’m satisfied. I also ordered it in brown and I’m really looking forward to wearing it often!  The material is thick in a “quality” way and the smell some people complain about? That’s denim. It will go away after a few washes.  Because it’s denim, I won’t dry it in the dryer again, but I did the first time to shrink it. (Never dry denim jeans—-but this isn’t jeans)  Love it

I love this casual denim dress! Flattering, comfortable and looks a lot more expensive ! Very pleased!

This item arrived today . The dress was rolled up tight in a plastic bag. The chemical smell is aweful on this dress!  I'm not sure how to explain but I won't buy again! I'd send it back but I'll use it cut up for car rags! It's made in China and Wow, did I buy something aweful! Quality poor. Smell is very chemical, maybe the dye but I've never had a bad purchase from Amazon like this! Very unhappy! China you can do us better than that!!!!! Omg!!!!
Great price for being thick maternal. Fit is great but I wish it had pockets.
Very cute dress!
great. like it veery much.

Fabric is thicker than expected. Around the torso and chest it's pretty tight. I'm pretty small chested so that surprised me. I have to wear a tan top underneath and keep the top few buttons undone. Overall though it's cute.
